text: Urus may refer to: * Aurochs, a type of cattle * ğŒ¿, a letter of the Gothic alphabet * Urs, death anniversary of a Sufi saint, mostly observed in South Asia * Urus Khan (died 1377), a Khan of the Blue Horde between 1374 and 1376 * Uru people, an ethnic group in Bolivia * Lamborghini Urus, a mid-size SUV from Lamborghini * UruÅŸ, BeypazarÄ±, Turkey * Yanarahu (Carhuaz-Huaraz) or Urus, a mountain in Peru
title: Urus
